library.description: This project is an attempt to build re-usable charts and chart components for d3.js without taking away the power that d3.js gives you. This is a very young collection of components, with the goal of keeping these components very customizeable, staying away from your standard cookie cutter solutions.
library.name: NVD3

library.description:
Flot is a pure JavaScript plotting library for jQuery, with a focus on simple usage, attractive looks and interactive features.

Works with Internet Explorer 6+, Chrome, Firefox 2+, Safari 3+ and Opera 9.5+
library.name: Flot

library.description: Lightweight standalone javascript library to plot charts, pies, river, etc in a canvas element.
library.name: Harry Plotter

library.description: A JavaScript library for numerical mathematics: special functions of complex numbers, numerical linear algebra, quadrature, statistical functions and plotting.
library.name: Jmat.js
